â€œLovely little high, earthy with a hint of black pepper and spice aftertaste. Very uplifting and energizing, though if you smoke/vape a significant amount you can get quite lost in the tangental thoughts the weed encourages. Overall, though, a very enjoyable and relaxing high.â€

â€œLuv it! Imo it's best for beginners! I quitted smoking for 3 months after a bad weed trip (anxiety until i went to bed). After the break i started with a few harder strains which got me anxious again. But this strain flipped it! Smoked it 2 days ago in Amsterdam and i'm feelin real good! You don't feel it that hard. You just feel balanced, no faster heart rate and your thoughts are clear!â€

â€œHelps me get super creative and uplifted.
1/2 star off for awful dry mouth tho. Never had it worse.â€
